entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
